string-array.name: greetings
string-array.item: Here we are finally, we\'re in %s, a beautiful village! Birds tweet, fishes swim fast in the lake, sheeps bleat happy in the camps and.. strangers arrive at the village. They\'re many, they\'re weird: some of them are werewolves!

Welcome everyone! You\'re in %s, one of the beauty of this world. Before getting you to your rooms we wanted you to know there have been recorded some hawls the past days. We highly recommend you not to leave the village by night. Alright, now I\'ll get you to your rooms, please follow.
We are in %s, the country par excellence when it comes to sightings of werewolves .. just kidding, do not worry! Just seal doors and windows at night..
Hi, you are in %s, one of the most beautiful countries of the place! Enjoy the scenery and surroundings by day.. by night stay at home though.
